name: assembler
description: Tool for automating division of students into project groups.

scripts.postinstall: npm run install:all && npm run build-all
scripts.install:all: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && rm -rf ../server/public/ && cp -r build/ ../server/public
scripts.build-all: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: docker-compose build test-app && docker-compose run tests; docker-compose down

author: University of Helsinki
